title: Ticket #753: Create a VARS DAGMan test
description: We should have a test that explicitly passes in various values via the VARS keyword, and actually makes sure that the jobs get the right values. Hmm -- maybe this could also check that the jobs get the right values for the parent node information.
remarks: By wenger, 2009-12-16: Just finished this up and pushed it (on the master) -- job_dagman_vars in condor_tests.
creator: wenger
